overview: In small town Carlton Bob, the head of the Progressive  Association, the local accountant and the boxing coach at the  men-only gym, hires a masseuse from Auckland. Sandra is quite  happy to give straight massage, but Bob pressures her to give  "city massages". The wives are disturbed by her presence -  perhaps with some justification. The climax occurs when  accountant Phil, wants to leave his wife for Sandra; but when  she rejects him, he smashes up the gym. The boys rally round to  hush up Phil's indiscretion.
tagline: Aspects of Small Town New Zealand
title: Skin Deep
